TopicTitle: How Do You Select A Focus When You're Not In The Map Mode?

Articles.Content: Recently while playing KSP, I lost power and my computer restarted. When I rebooted and started KSP, my game was saved and I could go look at my Kerbal and his spacecraft that I had landed on the Mun. The only problem is that I can't seem to get my game to refocus on the spaceship or my Kerbal to move them around or control my ship. Any Help?
Dude, you rock. Thanks for that. I guess I should've looked in the controls...
